Definitely recommend the smoked prime rib (a Saturday night dinner special) and rib eye with the rib rub and teriyaki butter! . . . And if you like beer, 101 to choose from! 🍺
Shepherd is amazing. Loved him. $1 ribs on monday is also pretty cool considering the normal price of a rack. Huge and pretty great selection of beer on tap and TVs to watch games.
Great food, friendly staff. I had the smoked prime rib Saturday special. It was wonderful! Garlic mashed potatoes, yummy. Fresh veggies looked perfectly.
Best place to eat for dinner, hands down. Employees are super nice and well trained, food is good, amazing interior design. I have no problems at all! You must go to this place!

While the food is good, they have a policy trying to force you to sit in the bar. When you come in they will tell you there’s a wait in the restaurant side but your welcome to sit the bar. They did this to us today even though there was only one table full in the restaurant and all the other tables were empty. The staff then said it’s “our policy to keep people from sitting in the restaurant so we don’t get to full” this is HORRIBLE and unacceptable customer service. How about I help you stay empty by leaving this review and keeping my family out of your restaurant. Some people don’t want to be forced to go to a bar!

name: The Cracker Box Diner
address: 402 E William St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: The Cracker Box is one of the best breakfast places in the area. Their food is fresh, comes in generous proportions, and they have a wide selection of menu options. They even have fresh squeezed juice. They have great cooks who will cook to order. The wait staff is always friendly, they all help each other out, and everyone is happy to help! CASH ONLY, so be prepared. Their service is always tops. The owner is usually out there helping in the restaurant. It is an authentic diner and a nice place to see familiar faces.

Great old time food! The biscuits and gravy could sustain a platoon for a week. The BLT on Sourdough had plenty of bacon and lots of mayo, delicious. Staff was friendly and there was a welcoming sncse to the whole place. We went out of our way from Mammoth to Reno to stop and enjoy.

This is a very cool little American food joint. The service was good. The food was great and the griddle is right out by the bar so you can watch the boys whip up some of the best eggs and hash browns out there. Would recommend.

Always a must when we visit our Son in Dayton Nevada, we stay in Carson City and it is close to where we stay at, The Craker Box continues to serve great sized meals that are always delicious! I had the patty melt well 1/4 of it and some French fries cooked perfectly but as usual I got full and couldn't eat it all 🤗 I shared! The husband had a chili size with cheese and onions, it was also delicious the chili is very good and the hamburger very tasty you can tell it is fresh hamburger meat! A big plus!! We had ranch on the side for our fries put tapatio in mine like it a little spicy. This place is a must for your visit they do not disappoint❣We go every time and will continue to do so.... Enjoy
A really cute little diner. The wait staff are very friendly. The food is good portions, cheap and delicious. I had the flapjacks with sausage.

name: Heidi's Family Restaurant
address: 1020 N Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews:
Heidi's was a cozy little place to eat. The wait staff was nice. They checked on us, but not so much it was annoying.
The food was good, and we did not have a long wait for it. I had the meat lovers omelette. Loads of bacon sausage and ham in it with cheese, I chose to have it with a biscuit and home fries. Omelette was perfect. The biscuit was pretty tasty, not bland and dry like at a lot of places. The home fries were done just right.
It seemed like Heidi's was the breakfast place frequented by a lot of retirees. (Nothing wrong with that. They get to try more places being retired) what I liked was that I saw a few couples come in, and noticed that the waitress knew their names.

One of our go to breakfast places in Carson City with a large menu offering from breakfast skillets, benedicts to crepes and most everything you could imagine for breakfast - just take a look at the fantabulous menu.  Located on the corner of Hwy 50 (William Street) and N. Carson Street with a small parking lot.  This cozy little breakfast and lunch establishment is well worth stopping in for a quick bite and great service.

A few of our favorite dishes include the Emerald Bay Skillet with potatoes, mushrooms, bacon, diced avocado, feta cheese and two over medium eggs plus choice of toast or house-made biscuit which we generally lean towards the biscuits and the skillet is deLISH!!  Chicken Egg White Scramble with broccoli, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese and a side of cottage cheese ~ OMTASTY goodness!! How about Four Pancakes and scrambled eggs with ham FOR THE WIN! why not try one of these Traditional Eggs Benedict or the Oscar Benedict both with potatoes and house-made sauce ~ yummilicious goodness!!  Service is always friendly and food is deLISH!  We recommend Heidi's for a tasty breakfasts spot.

The staff at Heidi's Family Restaurant are super nice and accommodating to this out-of-town visitor for the day.  If work beings me out this way of Carson City, Nevada in the future, will be sure to try other items on their menu.  Today's visit for Breakfast, I felt the want of just the basic breakfast and that would be the Pancake Sandwich (2- Fluffy but thick Pancakes, 2 Eggs (Any style) and a choice on 2-Bacons or 2-Sausages.  I ordered a side of Home Fries (just cubed Fried Potatoes) as well.  

My pancakes were filling and soft and fluffy. The Bacon was crisp and crunchy, not burned... the scrambled Eggs were fluffy and perfectly cooked (unlike some restaurant chains that serve scrambled eggs with a watery look to them).  The side of Home Fries was what I really needed to make the Breakfast complete.   I officially give Heidi's Family Restaurant a 5 Stars rating and highly recommend to visit again and again.....  I can hardly wait!!!!

Vegetarian options available without requiring customization. This is a high-value detail. Being able to order a veggie benedict straight from the menu makes the a big winner for having the conscientiousness and willingness to serve a diversity with delight. Creative pancakes, waffles and carries has my curiosity as return visits are likely.
Small and cozy place. Ate chicken fajitas omlete. Wasn't the best but wasn't bad either. Fruits were fresh. Coffee and service was good

name: Carson City Black Bear Diner
address: 900 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: The staff was very cheerful, and helpful. We have allergies and gluten intolerance in our crew, and our waitress and cook did excellent keeping us all safe, while making delicious and fun food. Unlike most other casino restaurants in town, no smoky atmosphere either. The prices are a little higher than other casino restaurants, but the food and air quality definitely made it worthwhile. Thanks guys!
Delicious food with lots of flavor the costumer service is excellent i recommend the big bob burger
Tasty & Large Portions for your money

An amazing place for breakfast, lunch and dinner! The food choices are endless and so delicious. My first time here was a while back but I would eat here everyday if I could. The staff were also amazing, really loved this place. 5 stars right of the bat for them (:

We're locals and we pretty much go every weekend, we sure do enjoy the food. They are usually busy and sometimes have a wait, but its worth it. The Staff could be more friendlier and should slow down while they are taking your order or when they are being asked for other things.

name: Z Bistro
address: 725 Basque Way, Carson City, NV 89706, USA
reviews: I came in to her restaurant on behalf of a fast food delivery app. The employee was so rude to me. She wouldn't let me speak and kept saying "uh uh absolutely not". I am only a driver. I go where I am told. This women treated me with so much disrespect. It is unreal. I hope she doesn't treat her actual customers as rudely as she treated me. Horrible women. Horrible customer service!!!
Our first and best poached pear!
Food is very good, often you get to eat whats in season, a must go place whenever we are in town. Owner Tina very friendly. She remember you by name.
Always incredible!! Service is top notch and the food unbelievably delicious!
High quality food and delicious food. Service was quick and friendly

name: Garibaldi's Italian Kitchen
address: 307 N Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews:
I meet Letty here for dinner. I found the food to be amazing! The wine was great, service was great and make sure you make a reservation. Make your way there as soon as you can. Great place to eat and drink.
Enjoy!!

It was just a few short weeks ago that I wrote a review for an Italian restaurant in Buffalo New York, giving it 5 stars and stating that it was the best Italian food I had ever eaten anywhere. I'm here to tell you that Garibaldi's blows that place away. I had the traditional spaghetti and meatballs and it was amazing. The sauce was very authentic and I loved the garlic that they used in the sauce. The meatballs were huge and delicious. My wife got a chicken dish, I can't remember the name of it, but it was made with some kind of lemon marinade and baked. That was equally amazing. On top of all that, the service was excellent, quick and friendly. you are missing out if you don't go to Garibaldi's for a great Italian meal.

It was a pleasure to be saw as I human not  like a bum from out in a field that they didn't want to deal with . Very pleasant kind manners . Listening to what I asked for even thought it wasn't on the menu. This is definitely great food.

We had a great dinner at Girabaldi's tonight. I had the snapper special and my partner had the sole Dore. Both fish were cooked perfectly which is no small accomplishment. We had the clams and mussels appetiser for a starter and it was wonderful. Plus our server Julie was the best!
Outstanding food! My scallops were cooked to perfection and the garlic bread was great! I highly recommend Garibaldi's.

name: Pho Country
address: 2495 N Carson St, Carson City, NV 89706, USA
reviews: For my first time here, I ordered 50B off the menu. Food came out very quickly. It looked great but had very little flavor. Table service was below average and the employees weren't friendly. Not a positive experience for me.

Holy Pholy this place is good!

This was the best and most fresh Pho I've eaten in my life, not joking.  I had to personally tell the owner how I felt about my meal when I left.

I had just finished a half marathon in Tahoe and was ravenous.  My body must have been craving a big bowl of warm comfort but since I had carbo-loaded the night before, I omitted the noodles and asked for only veggies, shrimp, and chicken in broth.  We ordered the shrimp spring rolls and pork crispy rolls which were also the best I have had.  I can't reiterate enough how fresh everything was.  

I must mention the vegetables in my Pho were so perfectly cooked and bright in color, the chicken was all white meat and extremely tender, and the shrimp melted in my mouth.  The broth was nowhere near "too salty" and only tasted flavorful, I drank every last drop.

Already looking forward to ordering the same exact thing next time I drive through Carson.
Quick service and fresh food. Nice quaint place; would not recommend going during the busy times.
In this case you’re better off getting microwave Chinese from frozen section at grocer. No sarcasm. Note that other reviews mention absence of flavor. I wouldn’t post this if it wasn’t honest.

Our first visit to Pho Country and it was fantastic in every way possible. 

We were seated quickly in this busy restaurant. We ordered two bowls of bun nuoc (beef flank noodle soup), one bun vermicelli noodle bowl and a calimari appetizer. The appetizer was served immediately: crisp, well seasoned, and our son who hates seafood loved this with the lightly sauteed onions. (I'd have eaten just these onions for dinner!!!).

Service was quick and friendly. Prices are extremely reasonable, especially for the very generous portions. We'd have eaten more if our stomachs could have held it. 

Next time we visit Carson City, this is a restaurant we'll easily eat at once again!

name: Duke's Steakhouse
address: 3800 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Server Ron best yet excellent food

So my steak was prepared the way I wanted because I made sure it came that way. However my friend and his son's steaks were extremely under cooked. My friends sins steak was blue! Our server was awesome, very apologetic and gave us great service. I would go back but will not order a special ever again. To them a special is a reason to jack up the price a few $$s more for just adding inedible cheese.

Had a great time at Duke’s tonight.  We were here from out of town staying at the hotel next door and happened upon the restaurant.  We ate at the bar and the food and service was excellent.  A big thanks to Dan for a great dining experience!
Staff was great! Filet not so great. Hard as a rock and the sauce was definitely needed. 6 ounce filet looked like 4.

Nice place and nice people. The oysters were the best I've ever had. But the steak was full of fat. Like almost half of it was fat. The veggies didnt seem to be done all the way, they were hard. My wife ordered chicken cordon bleu , it was plain tasted like nothing and was very dry. NOT WORTH THE PRICE

name: Scoups Ice Cream & Soup Bar
address: 224 #4 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Best place for soups in Northern Nevada, hands down. The staff is always super friendly and willing to let you taste before you buy! Thanks for the great soups and scoops!
The vegetarian chili in a sourdough bread bowl was very tasty.  Their pulled pork sliders were also good.   Very nice place for a healthy lunch.   The rating should be 3.5 stars.

Really cool little place across from the Capital. I only had the soup, so I can't speak to the quality of the ice cream, but the soup was really good. The service was fast and friendly. The prices weren't great, but they were at least reasonable. I honestly can't find any fault.

Came in pretty late one night
We were treated with exceptional service and offered lots of samples.
This place does it right, they want you there and you can feel it, plus everything tastes great!
If your around it's worth stopping in
Employees are very friendly,  has a home style feel & ice cream is really good !

name: Squeeze In
address: 308 N Curry St Suite 102, Carson City, NV 89703, USA
reviews:
Heidi is wonderful! She really makes us feel like family. The atmosphere is fun and all the staff are friendly and cheerful. My food was prepared exactly as I like it. The team remembers what I like at every visit and offers it to me before I can even request it! Incredible service!!
I wish there was a gluten free bread option for toast and sandwiches. I have gluten allergy, and not being able to eat a GF bread is the only thing I dislike at Squeeze In!

Squeeze In is delicious and vibrant. A semi-chaotic busy environment warms the space and activates the diner with involvement. The staff is friendly and keeps an attentive awareness to each table supporting one another creating a good service. ⚠️ I did have an issue of not getting the right dish as I ordered a vegetarian benedict and after a wait got a ham of hell dish, it was restored and I got the right dish pretty quickly. 
Coffee was delicious, and I was even offered a fresh cup for the road. 🤩
Lots of vegetarian options!

Very nice place. Great menu options. Our meals were fresh, the portions were just right, and delicious. The service was very friendly and kept us comfortable with water refills or other requests. It was a busy time, yet the feel remained relaxed and comfortable. We joined the club and look forward to returning.

We love Heidi and her crew#!They are always welcoming and ready with smiles.  So glad that Carson City Squeeze In and the crew are able to keep going through this Covid-19 mess.  We are trying to help our local businesses.
Such a great experience at such a crazy time! Picked up a to-go order today and the few staff members that were there were ALL wearing gloves and masks, even the cooks! Food was amazing as usual!

name: Flat Earth Pizza
address: 2010 E William St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Awesome pizza, great service, and really nice place all around. For being such a big pizza, it came faster than expected. Tried new kinds of pizza and the flavors were rich and delicious. Everyone was very friendly and relaxed. We look forward to trying more. Delicious crust!!!

This is a great place to get a good pie. The mushroom one is my favorite and the bbq pork was also fantastic. Salad as you can see was beautiful and very good. Homemade vinaigrette dressing is ah-mazing! Make sure you get extra.

First of all the pizza selection is huge with a plethora of unique toppings to satisfy any pizza connaisseur. The pizza itself is made perfectly, but surprisingly enough I didn't get inspired to write this review because of the pizza. You guys blew me away with those smoked wings. They were smoked perfectly and are from now on going to be my go to whenever I want me some wings. Only criticism make that extra hot just a tad hotter, but that might just be me... Thanks for the great service!

Pizza was delicious and baked perfectly. Smoked wings had a generous amount of sauce of our choosing and also delicious. The Tuscany Salad with smoked chicken added, had amazing homemade salad dressing and was phenomenal! Definitely recommend and will eat there again.

Found this amazing pizza joint as we explored Reno! A must when in the area! Great staff, friendly service, clean facility and the pizza is delicious! 

Pictured is The Great Bambino (hold the mushrooms and olives).

A must next time we are in town!

name: Ming's
address: 2330 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Ordered sushi, tried a few different rolls but everything tasted the same; minus the exception for the spicy tuna roll that was the only good roll in my opinion. Oh yea while i was paying I over heard a patron order the "all you can eat sushi" I immediately ask and was met with smirks and laughter from the staff and told i didn't "ask" about the all you can eat so i was charged full price. Can't believe i almost left a tip.

The pork chow mein is ridiculously good. Like, wow, easily the best we have had in Carson. 

I already have a favorite Chinese place here in Carson, but I still like to try other restaurants just in case. We typically order pork chow mein and Mongolian beef at each restaurant, and my husband tries something random each time. 

I've already mentioned how good the chow mein was, seriously, so good. The Mongolian beef on the other hand was, not great. Not spicy even though there was a chili next to it on the menu, no sweetness, not savory, and had a slight hint of fish flavor (which is my big no no for Mongolian beef). So if Mongolian beef if your thing, like it is mine, this isn't your restaurant. My husband ordered the garlic chicken cause it was supposed to be spicy, also wasn't spicy. 

We ordered these items for take out.

Went there to have lunch to go.  I ordered sweet and sour shrimps. It was an ugly experience when I got home to eat.  The shrimps had been cooked in a heavy red sauce, probably with MSG preservative.  The  shrimps were so hard it was obvious that they were cooked a day or two before today and kept to use them when needed. My lunch ended up in the garbage.  No need to ever return to this place. That’s too bad because Carson City can use a good quality Chinese restaurant.

Awesome selection of sushi. You will not be disappointed especially if you do the all you can eat special.

I love there salmon skin rool and spider roll. Careful if you get a long roll there big.
This review is on the sushi bar inside Ming's Restaurant. The sushi bar has affordable good sushi, We had 5 rolls, plus dessert and all had amazing taste. Vegetarian and Vegan friendly!

name: Bamboo Garden
address: 4250 Cochise St, Carson City, NV 89703, USA
reviews: This is the best Asian food I've had in some time. The BBQ egg foo young was meaty. The vegetable fresh. The gravy flavorful. Never been here before but will definitely make a trip from Reno. Just for this food

Pretty good food. I have had better but it's part for Carson. If you get them on a good day the food is a little above average otherwise it's typical. Not bad but not great either. We eat here often because it's convenient.
Best place to go!! Fantastic food and service ALWAYS!! Have food no one else does and treats you like family
Big menu. Hot and sour soup very tasty. Rice is like all chinese restaurant rice, a bit hard. Bbq ribs were nice and big serving.
We had house fried rice, sesame chicken and when I got to the crispy walnut shrimp....amazing. The Who,e meal was delicious!!

name: Rum Jungle Buffet
address: 3800 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews:
Came here to have dinner with my family. Stood in line for 20 minutes and nobody walked up or greeted us. The "chefs" at the time just stood there and stared while they looked at each other in confusion. 

As we waited, we can hear the bussers talking and asking here the cashier is to get us seated. Few minutes after, we see a woman walk towards us like nothing happened. No greeting whatsoever and just asked how many people and proceeded to charge us. 

When we got seated, we rushed to the food only to find old food. Everything I picked and tasted stale and disgusting. We came here only for the AYCE and the reviews. Obviously customers reviewing and giving 3+ stars were either drunk or had no other choice of food options. 

I would not recommend this place to anyone!
I had meatloaf, it was bad (the sides were good).  My wife had chicken fried steak, it was good. The service was good.
My wife and I love the Champagne Brunch on Sunday we have made the trip from Reno to Carson City several times and have never had a bad experience.
Let's raise the prices really on cold food!! And bland food Reno Buffett have better for those prices.. come on
Good place to eat if you like to eat at a buffet

name: El Charro Avitia
address: 4389 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews:
Excellent restraraunt, great food and service, I highly recommend them. They have authentic Mexican Food and are centrally located in Carson City, NV.

Their atmosphere is certainly a true Mexican style, it reminds me of being in Mexico as a child, visit and enjoy 👍👍👍
Ordered take out due to the covid 19 pandemic. My wife ordered the chicken enchilada and I had the chicken burrito. If you have had Mexican food in California, dont expect to get that here.

I have been going here for over 40 years. The food is consistent, tasty, and service is usually very friendly and good. The house Margarita is tasty, chips are fresh, and if you like hot, ask for the "kitchen" salsa.
This place is amazing. Delicious food fresh salsa and homemade chips do die for mmmm. The service is excellent. Clean place too.

We like this place so much and go so often that we call it "our Mexican place". We always have a nice time and enjoy the food and drinks. We planned some of our wedding here ❤️ so it will always be a special place. Try the Mexican Tea cocktail, it is my wife's favorite.

name: Mom & Pop's Diner
address: 224 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Nice little quirky diner across from the Nevada Capital buildings. Loved the food, but could have received better attention by the service. Though, first person who served is wasn't a regular server.
The owner is a hoot. He has a dry sense of humor. The food is very good. You can order to your liking or off the menu. Outside seating in the summer.

As soon as we walked in we were greeted with a smile and they got our drinks right away. Once I found out they allow dogs on the patio I ran and got my puppy and the workers had no problem switching our table to outside. Great food and a great price

This is a nice place for good breakfast eats any day the week. They of their own version of skillets and omelets and interestin takes on breakfast. The food is pretty affordable in the coffee's always piping hot.

Letty and I had breakfast here. The food was very good. 
Enjoy!

name: Peg's
address: 3697 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Peg's is great, food is excellent, I had the biscuits and gravy...damn good! My server Evelyn was friendly and quick, and has a great smile! In fact, all the servers here are top notch. It gets busy, because it is so dang popular, for good reason! Fantastic value and pleasing service! Thumbs up!

Friendly staff, good portions, tasty food. Not outstanding, but very good. It was our second choice because our first choice was too crowded. We really wanted mimosas but no alcohol served here, which was disappointing.

The food was delicious and the portions were large! Their coffee was bland but as expected from a diner. You'll definitely get your money's worth here. Recommend to anyone who's looking for some good food for a bargain!
I'd recommend this place for anyone looking for a great breakfast spot in this small town. Wide variety of options and great service.
Wow!  Fantastic food and service. I had the Altogether sandwich and can't wait to try a burger or breakfast. Definitely be back soon!

name: Kei Sushi
address: 3220 US-50 #4, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: This is place to get sushi in Carson City.  Decor is beautiful and you are seated right away.  Tables are close together is the only criticism I can think of for this place.  You can watch the chefs working and request things that they make pretty much immediately and serve you, so you can be in and out of this restaurant very quickly if you wanted to.  I have eaten here many times and always enjoyed their fresh dishes.  It is a nice dining experience overall, so if you like sushi you should check it out.  Prices are not bad either considering.
Its excellent. However this time their fish was cut thinner and more rice was added, so it was difficult to even taste the fish
Amazing service and amazing food! They were busy as expected for Valentine's day but the staff was so efficient and quick to get our orders out we barely even noticed, as always Kei was amazing 😊

Worst service ever! Asked for water 3 times before I got any, we were there for an hour before everyone got served a roll each. My boyfriend asked for a specialty drink and they gave it to him in a sampler glass instead of a full sized glass. We were with 6 other people so  we split the check and they add gratuity which was okay except we didn't even do the all you can eat, we each got one roll each and I am pretty sure the added 18 percent is for the all you can eat menu. My boyfriend and I left first and they told the rest of the party we didn't tip so they added our 18 percent to their bill when they had already added it to ours. It seemed they were so busy and nobody in the restaurant had food on their table and we had to ask for our check 3 time .  Worst sushi experience I have ever had as far as service but the food was pretty good.
i always have eaten here for sushi, the food is amazing and the people here make it even better. absolutely the best sushi in carson city!

name: Ti Amo Italian Grille
address: 3800 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: What a great place! The staff is helpful and the food is great!
Fantastic Food ! Great Atmosphere!😊
Good food and service. Eric was great.

The food was delicious! The service was friendly and prompt.  The kitchen was short staffed during my visit so it took them longer to serve our food, especially since we were a group of 8 which included 2 teens and a 9yr old.  However,  I completely forgot about the wait once I tasted the food, it was worth the wait.
Pretty good...nice portions. Nice clean restaurant. Shrimp Diablo was great. I would rate it a 3 n 1/2 but not an option. The scallops were fishy. Didn't feel ripped off but could be better.

name: Kim Lee's Sushi & Teriyaki
address: 319 N Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Sushi here I super fresh and delicious. We have had the same girl make our sushi twice now and it's always great. The reason I only give it 4 stars. The place is always super sticky when we go in there. Also they make their sushi big. Smaller rolls like less rice and pieces you could comfortable fit in your mouth would be nice. Other than that it's awesome.
Tasty and fresh! I find some of the long rolls have a bit of a strange combination... if you're  doing all you can eat order half or short rolls so you don't waist if you end up not liking it...

Steve did an outstanding job preparing my lunch. The food was fresh and the area very clean. Sorry to here that Joe had left.
great Job Steve.

My husband and I have found our new sushi spot, The best sushi we have had by far. Flavorful with every bite, very little rice so no choking it down or drenching in soy sauce. Will definitely be going back for more.
All you can eat appetizers, sushi, & dessert and all was so tasty. Our individual chef Carla was fun to watch as she prepared our sushi. Great atmosphere.

name: Gather Carson City
address: 402 N Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: I loved this place. Really comfortable atmosphere, unique menu but easy to find something delicious, kind staff, and the best part was the locally sourced items. Meat and vodka sourced locally from Bentley, and it tasted delicious! Would definitely recommend to anyone for any occasion! What was really neat was a kids table of toys in case the little ones need a distraction. Really fun place. Will definitely be going again!

In the Carson City area for the week and my brother  took me there because he said it was good. They did not disappoint. Nice wait staff and quick turnaround on orders. 

The food is good and add in the service I will be back.

Great place for dinner! Stopped by while on a business trip to Carson. The manager was very accommodating ahead of time and the staff did a great job with our large group. The food was great along with the wine selection and IPA beer. I would definitely recommend this hidden gem to anyone.

One our favorite restaurants. Excellent food at very reasonable prices and great service. Menu is not as big as other places but everything I've had is excellent and they help support local producers as a Farm-to-Table establishment. We've introduced a number of friends to Gather and everyone has enjoyed it.

I was in town on a business trip and this restaurant was highly recommended. It met my expectations. Lots of menu choices for a variety of taste palettes. I especially loved the dessert - bread pudding with a fabulous bourbon sauce.  I have a few more nights in Carson City, and seriously thinking of going there again.

name: La Santaneca
address: 316 E Winnie Ln, Carson City, NV 89706, USA
reviews: This place has a great atmosphere, very friendly owner and staff. The food is super tasty, authentic El Salvadoran dishes, and drinks. This place is worth a try if you want a flavorful meal with the taste of Central America.

This was my first time to La Santaneca Restaurant.  They staff was very friendly and the food was outstanding.  If you ever have a chance to eat here I would highly recommend you give this restaurant a try.

What a CRAZY good little dive! I brought my mother there after reading the positive reviews of there food. I was in town visiting my mom and decided to try Salvadorian food for the first time, I was not disappointed at all. They have this crazy fruit salad drink that my mom and her friends are now addicted to (she’s been there 3 times in 10 days since I left. There poupusa are the only and best ones I’ve ever had. I peeked in the kitchen like I Alyson when eating at a new restaurant and it was SO CLEAN, I would eat off the floor. Can’t wait to visit my mom and go back.

The food was real good.   I had four different Pupusas (Shrimp, Veggie, Pork and House Special)  The service was outstanding.   The gentlemen waiting on us explained the menu and was very patience.  The dessert was tasty. (Empanada)   The whole experience was excellent.   Will definitely go back and try more.
Authentic Salvadorian food tastes like my grandmas and everyone is so nice they treat you like family

name: Mangia Tutto Pizzeria e Ristorante
address: 200 N Stewart St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Update 4/21, Mangia Tutto open for take out.  Give them a call. Just visited Mangia Tutto to pick up a pizza to take home.  It was twilight outside, inside atmosphere was soft lighting and enjoyable colors. They specialize in pizza,  a robust Italian menu with a full bar. A large screen TV was playing sports.  The pizza was a tasty 14 inch combo.  Give them a try.

Watch out Adele’s you have found your match for the best place to enjoy a wonderful dinner in our wonderful capital! Amazing friendly staff and the food is a game changer for dining out in Carson City! I can’t wait for my next visit! Every single person must try it once! And multiple times if you are a local!!!
We used Grub hub for our delivery. The food was still hot. If you have not tried the meatballs, you should. They have really good flavor. The marinara sauce is also very well done.

Very quiet, personable establishment. The deep dish was AMAZING. Don’t cut yourself short, if you want a cheap slice of cardboard, with some cheese and sauce on it, this IS NOT THE PLACE. The Chicago style deep dish will fill you up just looking at it. The taste and aroma is totally fulfilling and worth the price and wait.
Excited to have a new restaurant in town with some original flavors! The Italian wedding soup was amazing. Portions were very filling too. Great staff and the atmosphere was great!

name: Westside Pour House
address: 110 W Telegraph St, Carson City, NV 89703, USA
reviews: Geraoke (geriatric karaoke)  on Wednesdays is the best!  We always have a fabulous time!  It is a blast regardless of age!  The food is good and Katie the bartender is fabulous!
Right in the center of the downtown hot area in the redeveloped area. The pour hose is a long time local favorite. Friendly staff. Enjoy!
Very good out of the way place. The grill offers some great lunch choices. You wont go wrong with the penguin burger. They offer several choices of craft beers.
Always the last stop after wine walk to get some good food.  Pool tables and darts 😁

The Westside pour House is a bar and grill in Carson City. Located right downtown this is a rather large space that used to be a Mexican restaurant. I stop in here for lunch and have only
 had burgers but they have always been delicious.

name: Bleu Café
address: 240 E Winnie Ln, Carson City, NV 89706, USA
reviews: Small cafe with delicious breakfast and friendly staff. Variety of coffee cakes and fresh pastries. The Salmon Benedict was fantastic. The eggs were perfectly poached with runny yoke but fully cooked whites.
Bleu has re-opened for lunch, Monday - Friday.  Roberta has added a few things to the menu and has daily specials.  It's nice to have this little gem back open.

Great food, quiet environment, friendly and courteous staff too
😎😀😎
Great food made to order. Real gravy made from scratch. Housemade buttermilk biscuits. Great ambience.
Everything here was great. Only issue was being charged 6% for my credit card without being told there was a fee. I found this pretty unusual since it's a restaurant that also serves alcohol.

name: Tomo
address: 135 E Clearview Dr #127, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: I wish I could just hideout in the bathroom or sleep in the ceiling in between meals and just eat $20 all you can eat sushi forever. Amazing deal. Or at least stuff my pockets with quail eggs and philly hand rolls until I catch a felony FOREVER!!!

It was $25 for all you can eat. For the all you can eat menu, there was a good variety of options to choose from--appetizers, nigiri, hand rolls, and all types of rolls. The wait was around 40 minutes for a party of 2 at 7pm.

In Virginia, we have no all-you-can-eat sushi places.  This was my first time branching out from a California Roll. I'm so glad I did!  We tried many items from the menu, and everything was delicious and fresh!  The servers were friendly and helpful. If you're in the Carson City area, you have to give this place a try!

Best sushi I've had in ages! Fresh and lots of interesting choices. Great all you can eat menu for a good price (think it was $24,99). Most rolls do come in 8 or 10 pieces so take it slow when ordering ;) Quick service and friendly staff!

Really great and friendly service, fresh sushi, and the green tea cheesecake was so creative and delicious. I also appreciated that the mussels appetizer was out of the shell and conveniently on a spoon. Great all-around!

name: In-N-Out Burger
address: 957 Topsy Ln, Carson City, NV 89705, USA
reviews:
For hiring high school kids, this place is effective.

Absolutely fantastic fast food. In n out is notorious for fresh burgers and legendary animal fries, but this place is a gem in the rough.

They are very quick at preparing orders, despite monstrous lines and hoards of people.

They have never messed up my order in the years I have been going there.

The food is always the good quality you would expect.

I highly recommend this in n out.
Coming from Seattle, we were finally able to compare Dicks drive in to In n Out.... Don't know about a winner, but this location was great
Always good service and quick. There line was all the way to best buy parking lot and still was out within 10-20 minutes. They are doing a wonderful job. So impressive
Always a great experience with this place. They have never gotten my order wrong and my burger is delicious every single time. If you want quality and great customer service this is the ticket.
Double Double Animal Style with Extra Extra Pickles!  Deliciousness!!

name: Sage Cafe
address: 1600 Medical Pkwy, Carson City, NV 89703, USA
reviews: This does not taste like * hospital food*. I like the fact there is a daily special as well as a menu. Since this is inside Carson Tahoe Hospital, the employees are extra thoughtful and kind. Many folks are there and worried for a loved one. Not your standard customer. Special skills are needed when folks are hungry and emotional, or exhausted. Basic menu choices but the items are chosen for *comfort food* value. Lots of tasty healthy choices too! Clean and visually appealing dining area. Every condiment known to man in packets!!! We go there just for lunch. Pricing is reasonable too.
Great healthy food, specially where it is needed. Thank you.
best food around! The stir fry is AMAZING 😍
3.5 stars. Fast and friendly service. Food was tasty. I ordered Fish and Chips. Some of my fries were burnt and 2 small pieces of Fish.
Great food & spirts and kid friendly! Beautiful views and I do believe outdoor dinning. Also happy hour from 3 to pm.

name: China Bistro
address: 1280 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Mediocre at best. Unreasonable wait time,  egg in fried rice was burnt, slightly expensive, broccoli chicken had no flavor, and pot stickers definitely came from a frozen bag. They didn't even have the decency to give me a spoon for my wonton soup.

Great Chinese food,atmosphere, and service. The staff were friendly and welcoming.  The dining room was comfortable, and attractive. The menu robust, the prices moderate.  My noodles with chicken tasty.  It was very clean and well kept
 Local family owned andrin. I was pleasantly surprised all around. I recommend this restaurant

The food and service are always excellent. Always extremely fast and the owner always greets you personally and as always extremely pleasant. Absolutely love this place especially with all the new furniture and the remodel
Great food, excellent service, and a good value. Their spring roll is delicious!  I missed a fortune cookie though! They give you almond cookies.

Hands down the best Chinese food I've had in the area. Great portions, great prices, clean food. This is definitely my favorite Chinese place now. The staff is always friendly, it's clean inside and out and also has a drive thru.

name: L.A. Bakery
address: 1280 N Curry St, Carson City, NV 89703, USA
reviews: So i just ordered the 🍄 🍔 with some bacon and 🍟 and i have to say u guys have way better 🍔 and 🍟then any other place I've eaten at thank u so much for your business

I stopped in to have a quick salad the salad was OK except for nothing was bite-size and it was on the smallest plate you can imagine so even trying to cut up the food was challenging. I didn’t feel like the staff  appreciated the business I was giving them nor did I think they were polite. Also I feel it’s extremely overpriced Almost 8 dollars for a slice of carrot cake I don’t think I’ll go back
We always love the variety of food and the healthy choices.  Large portions on salads and yummy sandwiches.  We ordered a chocolate cream pie to go. It was ready right on time and looking super.
The place was very affordable for me and my family. We enjoyed and excellent dinner.

I used to love coming to this location and always referred friends and family here, but a few weeks ago I purchased their "love salad" and yes it was probably my favorite salad but I had an allergic reaction to something in it and when I went to talk to the manager about what ingredients were in the salad (not accusing anyone of anything) and was scolded by the manager for doing so. He was 100% positive that something like that would never happen as his restaurant! I was disappointed with how he handled it.

name: Living the Good Life
address: 1480 N Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Stopped in on our way back from Reno for a quick bite around 7pm on a Thursday night. Warm feel with an entertainer playing some good music. Two of us had the meatloaf and one had the skewers. The meat loaf was great  and just what I needed. The skewers we just ok. Service was excellent, friendly and fast. It's worth a try.

I felt so welcome here.  Live music and yummiest food.  I'm a sutter bug so here are the pictures.  Oh almost forgot you are encouraged to play a instrument or sing.  I had so much fun at Living the Good Life.

Tried some place new. The food was ok, small portions. One pork chop and a scoop of mashed potatoes for a large grown man wasn't a lot. He ended up ordering a half order of chicken livers also. So if you are into that they have them! I felt like we were the youngest people there and we are late 40s. It was VERY loud and noisy though coming from the other patrons so we were sure to leave before the live music started and it got any louder. I am not a boring ol' bitty by any means but, it was just a bit much when you are trying to relax and enjoy your dinner and have a conversation that's all I mean. The owner's father was there, forgive me I have a horrible memory, and he was awesome and so was our waitress. Maybe one day we will make it back in again...
Friendly staff, good selection of food and drink. Entertainment too!

Popular local restaurant and club. 40 plus crowd. The dinner menu is robust. The band were good and knew how to keep the crowd engaged and dancing. They offer live music outside most every night during the summer.  Give them a visit.

name: The Union
address: 302 N Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: A fun atmosphere in downtown Carson. We had the ahi nachos and the bee sting pizza. The Serrano peppers were HOT but it was a nice complement to the honey on the pizza as well. I would definitely go back.

Ryan who took our order and brought out our food gave exceptional customer service !

Did curbside pick up...brussel sprouts were AMAZING, empanadas were SO good...especially the cilantro sauce! Husband loved the Frank's Wings and the 3 Little Pig pizza was very good. We do date night every week even with the pandemic, and I have to say this was the best food we have had in a LONG time! 

We will be back! Thank you for giving us this option for take out!

The Union in Carson City, Nevada is a great place for a fun, laid back dinner. They serve their own beers plus other popular beers from area breweries. The food is fantastic! The soups are all in house creations using locally sourced ingredients. The burgers are made with locally raised beef. When you are given the choice between soup or fries, GET THE SOUP!

Everything here is freshly made, even down to the sauces. Expect a fresh spin on the classic ranch, ketchup and other classic sauces that you normally associate the flavor. Most of the food items I have tried have had unique and delicious flavor. You wont find flavor like this anywhere else in town. I was really in the mood for fries and their fries were beautifully spiced with a subtle hint of garlic and herbs. 

Our waiter, Kelson, was on top of it. He made our experience relaxed and took care of us when necessary. 

My boyfriend liked the beer, but wishes the menu more clearly defined if a beer was amber, blonde etc. The first blonde he ordered was really rather dark. 

Overall great beer, great food, great atmosphere. Good casual, laid back place. They also had some games on, which I quite enjoyed. It gave it a classy sports bar type of feel.
Awesome atmosphere and wonderful, locally sourced food. Try the Bee Sting pizza and the Dirty Duck Fries.

name: El Aguila Real Mexican Restaurant
address: 3220 US-50 #6, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: In my opinion, some of the best beans I've ever tasted. Service was top notch, attentive and very polite. Authentic, great atmosphere, and huge portions at great prices.  Do yourself a favor...the beans alone are worth it.
Delicious food , fast and friendly service, always a delight.

The service here is so quick!! The servers are really nice and the food is served super hot. Last time I got a chicken and beef enchilada during the lunch. I like that their salsa is spicy too. A lot of other places serve really bland, mild salsa, but this one had some kick!! They also serve a bean dip to go with your chips, which I love. The food is yummy and you aren't left waiting for service. They have good lunch specials!!

Mexican food is our absolute favorite. We've eaten at hundreds of different restaurants throughout the Southwest over the years. El Aguila real has the best refried beans we've ever tasted, and the rest of the fare is just as good. Highly recommended.
Fabulous food, great service and fair prices.

name: Joanie's Creekside Cafe & Catering
address: 1795 E College Pkwy #100, Carson City, NV 89706, USA
reviews: 3 stars since service was good (thanks Jessica). Had the Mediterranean chicken wrap with homemade potato salad.  Look at the wrap... the sliver of chicken is at the bottom.  This was a lettuce salad with a very small amount of chicken.  The potato salad was really good. Can't speak of other dishes since this was the first time I've been here. Really not impressed with the wrap.
The food was teriffic. My friend  took me for lunch, I had never been. I had the Acorn squash stuffed special and a great salad. I can't wait to go back 😋
What a great little find.  Food was really delicious. Presented well. Coffee was hot and endless.  Wait staff was really nice and welcoming.  We will definitely be back.
The vegetarian wrap was nice. Their desserts are really excellent. The service is surprisingly quick, as you'll see most clientele on weekdays are state employees, this is much appreciated!
Great food. Great customer service. Definitely i will b back soon.

name: Firehouse Subs
address: 3120 US-50, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews:
The first time I had ever been to a Firehouse Sub. I ordered a small engineer sandwich, chicken and noodle soup, and a small drink.
The cashier missed my order for the chicken noodle soup, and when my food was brought to me I asked about the soup and they looked at my receipt and even though I did not order it, they were more than happy to correct my lunch. Your line I was also informed that sometime this summer. I really hope so, as my experience in Carson City was awesome. I would recommend this place to anyone, not only because of the food, but they also help support the fire department in different areas.

Drop be through on a busy night, got me through quickly and correctly. Good was great. Good value. Drive thru staff very friendly in high stress environment. Definitely would go back and round up again

Firehouse subs is a wholesome establishment. They support a great cause, with some great sandwiches to back it up. I enjoy Italian sub sandwiches, but they offer a great variety of quick and quality meals. 

My only complaint is that they don't have a buffet style sandwich building line like subway or port of subs. 

Oh, the salsa is also fantastic.

This was the 2nd time I ate here.The roast beef and cheese sandwiches are delicious.  Great ,fun atmosphere , fast service and friendly service. They heat the sandwiches and that makes the bread soft and the sandwich better than most .

My first Firehouse Subs experience was a huge hit.  Service was fast, food was hot and tasty and the employees were nice.  The restaurant was clean and the TVs were in convenient locations.  Definitely looking to hit up more Firehouse Subs in the future.

name: Olive Garden Italian Restaurant
address: 4253 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Great place for a sumptuous Italian meal. Loved the Shrimp Scampi and Minestrone soup. And the bread, ofcourse, is heavenly.

My partner and I are in town from out of state and decided to stop for dinner. There is not enough words to describe how impressed we were by our server Stacey C. She was funny, sweet, and personable.  She added the perfect ending to a long work day. Olive Garden has an amazing asset in Stacey as any company would be lucky to have her as a server. We felt lucky as guests. Plus the food was great to boot and everyone else was friendly as well. We will be back and hope to have her again. Plus we will toss in a good word to our colleagues who stop to work in the area!
Delicious food, as expected. Their new to go curbside was very efficient and friendly staff as well. Love everything I have tried.

I found out about their take out Service they’re doing during this shut down due to the virus.  So I called and I ordered the two meals.  One of which is hot and one of which is refrigerated for later that day or the next day.   The second meal was free it’s a buy one get one free deal.  My hot meal was so large it actually lasted me for two days plus the free meal. So  I have had three amazing dinners thanks that they’re doing this service.  Amazing!!   Thanks.

Olive Garden is definitely high up on my list. Every meal that I've tried from there is delicious one way or another. The soups are very delicious as well and are unlimited, as are the salads. Service isn't the best, but not the worst either. Definitely recommend this restaurant.

name: Vino's pizza
address: 3228 N Carson St, Carson City, NV 89706, USA
reviews: This pizza was so good! Came here on vacation and it was the only place open late. They are generous with ingredients and server was nice and helpful answering questions. Lots of flavor. Tastes good as leftovers the next day too

Food was absolutely amazing! Now the service 🤔 we walked in and it was so nice and cozy and the waitress was not in the conversations mood. My husband kept complimenting the restaurant and the waitress just had this blank stare and I thought maybe it’s the end of the night so it’s fine. A few moments later a couple that is the same race as her sat down and I felt like they got a whole different waitress. I immediately saw the difference as she was standing right by them giving telling them how they run their business (when they didn’t even ask). Anyway she didn’t give us refills or check on us until we asked for the check (tip time) then it was oh anything else I can get you. Well we’re already ready to go so no. It really sucked because we were looking for a good legit high quality place and I guess we didn’t find it. It would have been completely fine if she wouldn’t have given outstanding service to the very next couple after giving us a cold shoulder. I definitely recommend if you are the same race as the waitress but not for anyone else lol. Don’t know what else it could have been 🤷🏻‍♀️

I haven't eaten much pizza since my children have been grown but Vino's has me hooked again. I especially like that ultra hot spicy sauce that they serve. YUM. Everything is always fresh and cooked to perfection. Their service is excellent. I highly recommend them.

This is by far the best pizza you will ever eat. Toppings are generous and well proportioned. Affordable for the quality of food as well. Staff is amazing and friendly. We will definitely be back here again.

So I had posted a review before but then my review was removed from Google for some reason. It won't let me repost from the same Google acct. I was respectful and detailed in my review. But it was removed. Seems like Google doesn't post honest reviews because they aren't highly rated. I've ate here many times. The last 3 times, it's been terrible. Burned, toppings are lacking and pizza has no flavor. Before the last 3 times, it was great. Best in town by far. Everyone has bad days but 3 times in a row!?  I don't know if I'll try it again. The last time, I'd rather have bought pizza from the guy with the orange toga.

name: Francisco's Mexican Restaurant
address: 1310 S Stewart St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: I eat here approximately 1-2 times a month and they have always been kind and welcoming to me and my family members. The service is outstanding, the food is delicious and I highly recommend the chicken enchiladas which is what I tend to order each time but I have also had other dishes that were also quite good. Try the tacos they are tasty. The food is often served quickly and hot, yet they never rush you out of the restaurant and always check on the table to see if you need anything, which I highly appreciate. If you are looking for good Mexican food with wonderful service, do try Francisco's.

We had great margaritas, entrees and even dessert. We are traveling from Wisconsin and this is one of the best meals I have had. Had mango margarita,    3 enchiladas with different meats and sopapillas.  The free chips were warm and they gave us both salsa and refried beans for dipping. Great prices, wonderful waitress. Highly recommend!
Pick up Order for the carne asada plate and Street Tacos. Awesome food. Very polite staff. Definitely return to try the rest of the menu!
Fast, friendly, and a smile with their customer service

The food was delicious and deserves 5 stars however the service was atrocious and deserves one so I'll split the difference and give them three there was only me and one other family in the whole restaurant and while the food came out ridiculously quickly and hot and fresh it took me 25 minutes to place my order which would still not be too bad but it took an entire meal before they refilled my chips and they never once asked to refill my drink which was empty before my meal even got there and sitting on the end of the table I even flag someone down and ask them to refill it or just bring me a water and they never did

name: Pizza Factory
address: 3120 Hwy 50 East, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews:
They gave me the lamest Cesar salad I've ever had. Asked for extra dressing for Cesar specifically and they gave me 2 incorrect dressings. Way over priced for what it was. My Husband liked his lasagna, kind of a small portion, but he said it was "eh, decent". 
We usually go to the one in Dayton & figured we'd give this one a shot. We'll give them another chance since we didn't try their pizza though.

I have been coming to pizza factory for 20+ years and not only have they gotten my order right everytime, they've also been very friendly and accommodating. They haven't changed their recipes so the meat sauce is top notch! Thank you!

They  have many kinds of pizza for choice in the noon buffet.
Cheese and sauce is perfect.
Good price
Duck coin machine. Plus good salad bar and good greasy pizza. And duck coin machine.

We do like the food and the prices are good, however, no one had a hair net on. The women had long hair and not all pulled Back. The had beards and some with longer hair and no hair nets. I almost didn't order but I can say I won't go back.

and

name: Johnny Rockets
address: 4600 Snyder Ave B, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Tasty hamburgers!! I got the one with jalapeños. The restaurant is cute and 50s retro. The server we had was nice and it had a family environment.
Hamburgers were delicious,  a bit pricey. Frys should be included with the burgers. If they were it would get a 5 star
The spot for my daily milkshake. They have a wide selection of shakes. In fact the shakes have their own menu. They will also custom make any shake you want.
I love this place!! Great atmosphere,  great food and a great staff all make it the nostalgic eatery I crave in every restaurant!! That jukebox is the best!!

The coolest diner atmosphere and best tasting hamburgers and great service. Please don't ever change like your corporate stores as the burgers tase tremendously better here in Carson City, NV. Other Johnny Rockets locations don't come anywhere close to the quality, taste and service here.

Grilled handmade burgers taste better and the deluxe shakes are scrumptious.

name: Battle Born Social
address: 318 N Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Amazingly unique drinks and great food really made this place stand out! In the heart of Downtown Carson City, this is a gem of a find. The drinks are different than anywhere I've ever been, and the food is delicious. We stuck to appetizers since we had eaten previously, but they were so incredible, and made fresh! The staff was so friendly and helpful, as their cocktails were so unusual. We will definitely be going back for a girl's night out!

This place is great very low key but good positive energy here i had the bbq beef sliders and they were delicious and very well portioned the waitress was as kind and professional as could be my company loved this place and would and will definitely visit again

Beautiful
Great food
The best cocktails
Joe best cocktails  ever
Great service
Our new favorite  it CC
👍👍👍❤❤👍❤👍

Food is terrible. I ordered the hotdog and they were out of some of the ingredients that were listed on the menu, they brought it to me anyway maybe thinking that I wouldn’t notice? But as I stared down at my dried out, shriveled hot dog, on a dry bun, I was immediately disappointed, and the waitress who saw it on my face just hurried off to see about getting me some condiments, which they were out of. Neither the waitress nor the manager who both knew that I was not happy with the garbage food they served me offered any discount on my $13 hot dog. Weird place, never returning.

What a phenomenal menu! Incredibly creative small plates. Though priced a bit high, it's a great, fun time trying new combinations of dishes. We LOVED the crawfish mac 'n cheese, and they did not skimp on the crawfish! The shrimp po' boy was LOADED. The espresso braised brisket over a bed of risotto was, shockingly, bland; perhaps a stronger taste in the glaze, or more seasoning on the brisket? The staff is incredibly friendly and knowledgeable.

name: China East
address: 1810 Us Highway 50 E, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Excellent food and service. The restaurant has A rating from the health inspector.  The food arrived at the table very fast. We enjoyed our meal. We had pot stickers, sweet and sour trio, and egg flower soup. We had lots of leftovers!  If you're in a rush, you can order at the drive up window. We will definitely go here again!

Not bad. Generals or sesame chicken is pretty good and the hot and sour soup is good. Price is reasonable.  Place could use a good cleaning as the tables always feel sticky...the place has gone up and down in quality over the years. I don't know if it is due to a change in staff or what so it is kind of hit and miss. But for the price it isn't bad for lunch or to take the family.

Number one I don’t think my husband got what we ordered. I had chicken chow fun and it’s not anywhere near as good as China East. I ordered six piece shrimp so that we could have it over $25 for delivery and they were cooked to death and hard as a rock and I couldn’t even taste the shrimp. I doubt we will try them out again.
Really enjoyed some great Chinese food! The pork egg fu young was amazing , but you forget to give us forks to eat !! We’ll be back and will double ck on utensils!!
As native Nevadans we've been eating here for years . We've never had any complaints and have always enjoyed our food. We recommend this place to anyone .

name: Flavors of India
address: 1105 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews:
Most authentic Indian food ever.

Seriously come down from South lake Tahoe to experience this food.

The atmosphere is of classical India

And beautiful

For weddings events parties

I could go on and on why this should be your first stop in Carson!

The owner is wonderful and this is a complete labor of love

There should be one of these in every village in America

Flavors of India 2020
The food is great and they vary the selection from day to day.

The service was great. That is so important. The problem was just is they had no dishes except one desert that weren't super spicy and plain rice. I've eaten at Indian restaurants before and always been able to find something to eat that wasn't too spicy. We were there for a birthday celebration so I had no choice but to stay.

Arrived at 1:30 p.m. right before they closed down the buffet. I have been to tons of Indian food buffets but I must admit, all of the food was fresh and delicious. The butter chicken and tandoori dishes were delectable,  
As well as the lentil and cabbage dishes.The mango lassie drinks  were superb.

I came here about 5 months ago when I was in town for work. Came back today to try the lunch buffet. Service was just as great as the first time and the food hasn't changed a bit either. I highly recommend this place. Great food wonderful service.

name: Juan's Mexican Grill
address: 3680 Goni Rd, Carson City, NV 89706, USA
reviews: Food is good, been eating here for 5+ years, consistency of food taste has improved in the last year.
Best food best host!!!
Amazing food! Went here for the first time and everything was awesome, service, atmosphere and food! Owner is great!

I went here as a visitor from California. The portion sizes were huge, the food was edible but the service was a little slow and uncoordinated.  Over all I'd recommend this place for a heafty meal and would side step it due to service.
The people are so friendly! Food tastes great, and all around an enjoyable atmosphere.

name: Playa Azul Méxican Restaurant
address: 415 E William St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: I was disappointed. Nothing in the tacos but meat and beans? The al pastor and asada were ok. The pork was pretty dry. Eh.

This little place has absolutely delicious food at a good price as well. I would eat here often when I lived in the area. It was such a good memory eating here again while in town. Thank you Playa Azul for the delicious meal and walk down memory lane. You still got it and are exceeding customers expectations. Keep up the good work and don't ever change.

Fantastic authentic Mexican food! There's a reason why this place has been here so long. The food is good and the service is great. They are fast and perfect for a super quick and tasty bite at lunch. I highly recommend this place for casual eating.
Excellent authentic enchiladas.   Fourstars, because they do need more drink options.   ,

A great place, blue mission style brick building  back when it was a taco bell. We love the hard to find sopes, which, with a cheese enchilada a la carte is filling and delicious. The unknown sauce on the sopes looks like sour cream (crema), but it isn't, I forgot to ask what it is.

name: Yang's Kitchen
address: 111 E Telegraph St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: One of the better Chinese fare in town.

Best place in town hands down, would most definitely recommend as they have both sushi and Chinese food all in one spot! And the sushi was so fresh I was so happy when we left, our family is definitely choosing here for our family nights out!

We had a really great experience here. The servers were very attentive and kind. We had the dim sum combo and the chicken chow fun and it was plenty of food for two people. So delicious! Our 1.5 year old loved the sesame seed balls. I wish we lived closer to Yang's!

There are  6 to 8 of us that go out to a different restaurant every week. We are not always in agreement of the outcome. Last night there were 6 of us and we all raved about the food, the prices, the generous portions and the friendly service. I already had some of my leftovers today at 11:00 a.m. and have enough left for a meal. Good going Yang's Kitchen!!!!!

This place has the best Chinese food in town. This is Mongolian beef lunch. Came with your choice steamed rice, chow main or fried rice. Also soup and appetizes. I had my Mongolian beef extra spicy #10.

name: Chili's Grill & Bar
address: 3784 US-395 S, Carson City, NV 89705, USA
reviews: There are many dishes to choose. Great service  The staff are very attentive The price is reasonable. Suitable for families. There are many menus to choose from.  Both Mexican food  American food . Modern shop decoration

I found Chili's Grill & bar to be very nice. I had their cheese sliders with bacon. It was a bit too salty for me. But still I did not have to wait, their employees were kind, and most importantly it was clean. A very nice place, I would go for a party. I rate a 8/10
Delicious! Great place to eat. I ordered the 1975 soft tacos, and they were amazing. A must stop and eat place I must say.

Ordered through door dash today. Hamburger only came with 16 fries and half of them were only half size. I ordered their queso salad, the tortilla was hard and salad was so small, barely covered the bottom of the container. There were more tortilla chips in the salad than lettuce. They also gave me only half of a little sauce cup of dressing. Very disappointing.

This place is an amazing place. I always come here to celebrate birthdays with family. I always get the delicious margaritas and the platter of delicious foods. It has a peaceful and family oriented vibe to the place. I always go here even when we go down to Carson. It's one of my favorite restaurants.

name: La Salsa Grill
address: 963 Topsy Ln #316, Carson City, NV 89705, USA
reviews: Amazing! The Al Pastor is delicious, I recommend the sopes.

Wow, am I surprised!  Pleasantly so. Very good and authentic Mexican food. Nice relaxing atmosphere. Large portions and very good, friendly service. Don't waste your time going to In N Out burgers next door. Your time and money are better spent here in this mom and pop Mexican restaurant. Trust me, you'll be happy you did.  Oh, and the mango marguerita is fantastic!!
Their customer service is wonderful. The food is great. This is one of my most favorite place for posole.

This makes two days in a row of visiting to eat Camarones Aguachile.  Shrimps in lime juice with jalapeno. Spicy, sour, and excellent. I tend to try and order different things each tinge I visit a restaurant, but this time it was a repeat of the previous night.
Good, small place to take your lady (or family) for a true Mexican meal.

name: Cucina Lupo
address: 308 N Curry St, Carson City, NV 89703, USA
reviews: Wonderful new addition to the Carson City restaurant scene.  The staff, the design and the ambiance were 5 star, our dinner entrees didn't meet chef Mark's usual standard.  But I'll be back, and I imagine these are new opening kinks which would work out.

Service was amazing, everyone is very up beat and happy. Food was absolutely wonderful! It's nice to have more GOOD food restaurants in Carson. I don't mind paying a little extra when the food is good! Highly recommend.

Me and my husband had an amazing Valentine's Day dinner. The 3 course special and desert was to die for. Great staff and service. Thank you James for giving us the VIP treatment and squeezing us in to your sold out night. We will for sure be back again many times

We ate our amazing food so quickly, I didn’t get photos fast enough! Some of the best Italian food I’ve ever tasted anywhere, including Italy 🇮🇹, New York and SF. Pasta is house made and fresh - it is AMAZING! Pasta dishes are large enough for 2-3 people. Delish salads and appetizers. The house red is $7/glass and wonderful with food. I wish this place was in Denver. I’d eat there several times a week.

Went for lunch. Pricey food. The house made meatballs in the sandwich were bland. Not enough sauce either. The soup was “warm” and the beans were hard (undercooked).  The Caesar salad did not have enough dressing. Another guest had Italian dressing on a salad which was wonderful. The reason for 2 stars.  There were 9 of us for lunch and the consensus was just OK but pricey.   I don’t think I will return.

name: Bella Vita Bistro & Catering
address: 1304 S Stewart St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Quick, delicious food and a relaxing atmosphere. The complimentary chips were perfect with the spicey thousand island dip. The black garlic vinaigrette was especially good. I ordered the grilled cheese with the extra bacon and tomato. They mistook my order but immediately fixed it at no extra charge. I'll definitely be back.

Friendly service, GREAT food and drinks for both lunch anddd dinner I am IN!!  Bella Vita Bistro never, I repeat never disappoints when it comes to service with a smile along with delicious food and drinks.  Whether you choose one of their House Specialties or the Special of the Day you will be veryyyy happy!  

We LOVE the little details of when we come in to eat that you are greeted with a bottle/carafe of water for the table along with house-made potato chips and parmesan garlic aioli dip that are absolutely deLISH!!

SOOO happy that they are open for dinner again with their full regular menu available along with an extended after 4pm menu anddd be sure to look for Daily Specials.  We LOVE the Pasta Specials and the Steamed Clams are TOO DIE FOR!!  Have to mention their Weekly Specials like Ladies and Guys night for different yummilicious Martinis and Smoked Whiskey Cocktails.  The Heirloom Bruschetta was absolutely deLISH with the Hot Truffle Pub Cheddar Cheese Dip with Pretzel bites and Baguette slices just being the OMCheesy goodness that I was craving!!

Lunch is ALWAYS quick for a meet-up during the week whether with a co-worker, friend or my hubby to grab my go-to of either the Big Bird Sandwich or Pear Gorgonzola Salad both are yummilicious!!

Look forward to popping in to Bella Vita to check out Friday Night Live Music and to nosh on another OMTASTY meal.

Letty and I had dinner here. The food was okay but the place was pretty empty. By the time we left a few more guest came in. Hopefully, when you go there are a few more guests there.
Enjoy.
Extremely good and a great way to spice up your lunch rush amazing service and awesome food 10/10 would go back again
Great food and service

name: Panda Kitchen
address: 1986 US-50, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Best Chinese restaurant in Carson City! The service has always been consistent and friendly. They're fast and the portions are HUGE. I'm always so full that I am almost crawling back to the car! They also have the best pot stickers in town. Also, order the lettuce wrapped chicken...you won't be disappointed!

I was honestly very skeptical about trying Chinese food in Carson City, NV. Having lived close to Houston most of my life, I'm no stranger to good Chinese food. 

This place serves pretty good food. 

Their chicken items were perfectly crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside.  Their hot and sour soup was good. 

Note: things that are labeled spicy aren't that spicy. I added chili sauce (ask for it), which gave my food some good heat. 

I would definitely eat here again.

Very good food, polite workers who let you eat in peace. Very cold temperature wise which left the last bit of my food cold. The will do no eggs in fried rice on request. The ambiance and mood feel relaxed some of the music was to energetic for the setting.

This was a great lunch date! The host/server was exceptional! He recommended the daily special, and it was superb! He was attentive but not overbearing. He asked how we liked the food, to which we said it was great, he then told the cooks in the back who then thanked us for coming in and and were very appreciative for the feedback. We will be returning. They have new new owners so give them a shot if you haven't been to Panda Kitchen in a while.

Pleasantly surprised to get all homemade food here. The soup was amazing!  Dont order more than one type of brown sauce chicken at once, as ours all came out the same. Still dying to try the general chicken! We ordered general and orange, and sweet and sour chicken, and all basically came out as the same dish, but that dish was excellent. Will happily go again and try again haha. Not the best service, but the food more than makes up for that. Server was very nice, just not efficient.

name: Tito's Restaurant
address: 444 E William St, Carson City, NV 89706, USA
reviews: There are a Group of us that often go there and we are treated so well. The food is terrific and the prices are competitive. I love the shredded beef tacos ❤️😋🌮
Great combination of tasty Mexican and seafood. I would highly recommend you visit Tito's.

The BEST food going. Don't be deceived by the name- you can get crab louie, prime rib and so much more. The chips and salsa are authentic and just plain good. If they sold by the jar (salsa) and bag (chips), I'd be all over it. They also make one of the worlds best bacon cheeseburger. No joke. The patty is perfect, the entire thing just compliments itself. I would consume daily if I was a local.
There is no better Mexican food than Tito’s.  Tito’s is the BEST!  Been eating there since 1989 when they opened their doors.  Love it.  You can’t go wrong.
Food came very quickly before margaritas, was good just seemed like the orders were pre-made and heated up or something.

name: QDOBA Mexican Eats
address: 933 Topsy Ln Suite 420, Carson City, NV 89706, USA
reviews: Foods decent. But everytime I get something hot, like steak or chicken tacos, it's cold by the time I sit down and try to eat it at the restaurant. Not sure how, when I just order meat and cheese on a corn tortilla.. it's saddening. I would expect it to be hot or at least warm enough to melt the cheese.
High rating for commercial fast food. Good cheap decent quality fast food when your on the go.
Good food. Always enjoyed it. A little disappointed that you can't get naked burritos (burrito bowl) as a kids meal anymore. That was a favorite with the littles.

SO DISGUSTING!!! I ordered a veggie burrito for pickup from this place and when I took the first bite I noticed the longest strand of hair inside my food. I tried to pull it out to take a picture but I couldn't because it was wrapped tightly around the contents of the burrito. Not that I would ever want anything from this repulsive place, but when I called several times to complain no one answered. Wish I could give them less than 1 star — disgusting!!
Pretty good food. Fast service, clean place, nice atmosphere. A little on the high price

name: RIVAS MEXICAN GRILL #9
address: 557 S Saliman Rd, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews:
I meet a friend here. This was my first time here. The food was good and the service was good. I would like to go back and try other dishes to give a better review. But for now give it a try, ill be back.
Enjoy!
Best Mexican food in town!! Really recommend it
Good service friendly staff food made fresh good big platters extremely attentive and I like that they have a drive thru. I'll definitely be ordering again!
Really great Mexico food. I had the steak fries. Portions are big for the price to me.  It is made to order, so don't be in a rush.

The food is really good to my personal taste buds. Was a little disappointed when I called ahead to order for pick up, and they didn't start it until several minutes after I arrived. I will still go back for more!
Been back multiple times. This has become a favorite for myself and co-workers!

Edit since original post: call ahead orders have been ready for pick up when I arrive, and the food is still amazing!

name: Taqueria La Salsa
address: 1946 E William St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews:
good mexican restaurant with decent prices. 
most of the food was great. customer service was good. chairs, tables are not so great.
I was very happy with the overall experience eating here.  Great menu selection with good prices.  Their food is light without a bunch of salt.  I'll definitely be returning again...😎
Food was great and authentic.  Service was excellent. Very nice people who run it.
You can tell they actually put effort into their food. The shredded beef is amazing, actually all their food I have had is great. Our go to Mexican restaurant in Carson. Great prices as well.

Absolutely delicious food! Real tacos! Loved the carnitas and al pastor tacos, and the wet burrito. The food looks authentic. The tacos are properly sized and are served on double corn tortillas. And everything tasted great! This is a real mexican food gem!

name: The Fox Brewpub
address: 310 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: Great eats and the beer selection is amazing! Service is quick and friendly. The potpie is huge! 😂
Ordered out during quarantine and they are amazing.. Thanks guys
Always a good time. Good beer. Good food. Good people. 🍺

Very solid beer selection, they make a competitive IPA and their pills or is actually decent. We had their fried pickles, perfectly cooked. Not greasy not heavy excellent taste. Will definitely be back for more. Person said he’s moving up the ladder. Thank you

Amazing food, great atmosphere and awesome service. My husband and I were getting tired just watching the waitresses zooming back and forth working hard to be sure everyone was taken care of. My husband had the ribeye steak with garlic and rosemary. It was perfect. I had the Santa Fe chicken salad. The chicken was seasoned and juicy and the dressing was great and there was a perfect amount. Ended the meal with the brownie sundae. Yum. We’d definitely come again next time we’re in Carson

name: The Red Hut Cafe & Soda Fountain
address: 4385 S Carson St, Carson City, NV 89701, USA
reviews: I'm giving it four stars, since 3.5 is not an option. The atmosphere is the typical diner vibe. They want you in fast and out fast. With it being my first visit, I had a hard time contemplating what to order. Your have a choice of your basic breakfast options, or your basic lunch options. The place is clean and the staff are friendly. -Regina

Slow service but the food more than makes up for it. The waitresses are very nice though.
Good specials are great very good pricing. Lots of bang for your buck.
Nice place very cozy place
Ice cream specialized coffee that they serve. I went for breakfast but noticed they do these 2 things though.
This place is awesome, love all the pictures and old original art. Food is really good and the portions perfect, not much and not to little. Just right in my book.

Very good breakfast and the coffee was surprisingly rich. Not like the usual brown water served at most diners.
The price was a little on the high side for Reno/Carson but worth it.
I love a good diner!
